faqs.question: What is the difference between Marla and Gaj when measuring land area in this region
faqs.answer: In the local context of Nizampur property measurements both Marla and Gaj are commonly used units. One Marla is approximately equivalent to 25.29 square meters or roughly 225 square feet. Conversions are crucial during the property buying process and our experts ensure precision. Generally one Gaj or square yard equals nine square feet. We ensure all listings clearly state both measurements for total clarity.
